rows.label: qst703201_msg0001
rows.name:
Get a grip, I beg you.
What's the use of worrying
before you've even set off?

rows.label: qst703201_msg0002
rows.name:
No, see, that's the worst part...
I thought I'd have the courage
by now, but it's just...

rows.label: qst703201_msg0003
rows.name:
Is something the matter?
You seem troubled.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0004
rows.name: Who're you then...?

rows.label: qst703201_msg0005
rows.name:
...Oh, this is great! Kaede, look!
We can just ask these people for help!

rows.label: qst703201_msg0006
rows.name:
Are we really going to go
through all this again?

rows.label: qst703201_msg0007
rows.name:
If I could interject... Why don't you just
tell us what's wrong, and then we'll 
take it from there, hm?

rows.label: qst703201_msg0008
rows.name:
Ah, I see. So Rita's only just become
a Driver?

rows.label: qst703201_msg0009
rows.name:
That's right! So I've come to Gula
to explore around, hoping I'd get a bit
stronger.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0010
rows.name:
And that's why you're asking strangers
for their help as soon as we arrive.
Makes sense.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0011
rows.name: Is that how little faith you have in me?

rows.label: qst703201_msg0012
rows.name:
Hey, that's not fair! You know I just...
*sigh*

rows.label: qst703201_msg0013
rows.name:
...Well, how about this? After you
head off, we'll follow you at a distance.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0014
rows.name: So we can step in if things get ropy?

rows.label: qst703201_msg0015
rows.name:
But if it looks like you're managing
on your own strength, we'll leave
well alone. Does that sound good?

rows.label: qst703201_msg0016
rows.name: Hmph. That seems reasonable enough...

rows.label: qst703201_msg0017
rows.name:
It does?! Awesome!
Thanks so much, guys!

rows.label: qst703201_msg0018
rows.name:
I knew we'd end up stepping into
something like this.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0019
rows.name:
Come off it, Hikari. Our meeting here
was also the work of fate, after all.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0020
rows.name:
...Before you go, we should establish
a clear goal. We can't keep providing
aid forever.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0021
rows.name:
For the time being, let's say we'll head
for the Serene Springside. It's meant
to be somewhere nearby.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0022
rows.name: Kasumi, any ideas?

rows.label: qst703201_msg0023
rows.name:
I have heard before it is
somewhere on the Divine Beast's back...
It shouldn't be far from here.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0024
rows.name:
Right on! In that case, we're off!
Time to move back-ward! ...Uh, I mean
forward! Uh, you know what I mean.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0025
rows.name:
I'm sorry she managed to get
you roped into this.

rows.label: qst703201_msg0026
rows.name: Here I go!
